description:
Limits the data cube to the specified threshold.

More precisely, the filter checks whether each of the temporal dimension labels matches the given threshold of the given filter.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The threshold to filter the data cube on. The filter checks whether each of the temporal dimension labels matches this threshold.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the data cube. Cu

returns.description: A data cube restricted to the specified threshold. The dimensions and dimension properties (name, type, labels, reference system and resolution) remain unchanged.

links.title: Filters explained in the openEO documentation
